subject: Decathlon
Olympic Games (2012)
lead_paragraph: Ashton Eaton took the gold and his teammate Trey Hardee finished second, marking the first time the United States has won two decathlon medals in the same Olympics since 1956.
snippet: Ashton Eaton took the gold and his teammate Trey Hardee finished second, marking the first time the United States has won two decathlon medals in the same Olympics since 1956.
